thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome Hotel
thread.title_full: Awesome Hotel - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: amysradar
title: Awesome Hotel
text: My dad and I got a twin room for a night that we were in London. Easy to get to. The room is nice. Other reviews say it's small, but when you're out all day taking in the sites, all the room is is to sleep in and store your stuff. If you want a proper hotel room pay the money and get something bigger, but the bathroom was nice, the bed were comfy and it had a tv (I don't have a TV so it's always nice to have television every once in a while). the reception staff are nice.
